devdoc.author: https://github.com/holographxyz
devdoc.details: This contract stores a reference to all the primary modules and variables of the protocol

constructor.details: Constructor is left empty and init is used instead

getBridge().details: Used for beaming holographable assets cross-chain

getChainId().details: Useful for checking if/when a hard fork occurs

getFactory().details: Used for deploying holographable smart contracts

getHolographChainId().details: Holograph uses an internal chain id mapping

getInterfaces().details: Holograph uses this contract to store data that needs to be accessed by a large portion of the modules

getOperator().details: All cross-chain Holograph Bridge beams are handled by the Holograph Operator module

getRegistry().details: This module stores a reference for all deployed holographable smart contracts

getTreasury().details: All of the Holograph Protocol assets are stored and managed by this module

getUtilityToken().details: This is the official utility token of the Holograph Protocol

init(bytes).details: This function is called by the deployer/factory when creating a contract

params.initPayload: abi encoded payload to use for contract initilaization

params.bridge: address of the Holograph Bridge smart contract to use

setChainId(uint256).details: Useful for updating once a hard fork has been mitigated

params.factory: address of the Holograph Factory smart contract to use

setHolographChainId(uint32).details: Useful for updating once a hard fork was mitigated

params.interfaces: address of the Holograph Interfaces smart contract to use

params.operator: address of the Holograph Operator smart contract to use

params.registry: address of the Holograph Registry smart contract to use

params.treasury: address of the Holograph Treasury smart contract to use

params.utilityToken: address of the Holograph Utility Token smart contract to use

devdoc.title: Holograph Protocol

getBridge().notice: Get the address of the Holograph Bridge module

getChainId().notice: Get the chain ID that the Protocol was deployed on

getFactory().notice: Get the address of the Holograph Factory module

getInterfaces().notice: Get the address of the Holograph Interfaces module

getOperator().notice: Get the address of the Holograph Operator module

getUtilityToken().notice: Get the Holograph Utility Token address

init(bytes).notice: Used internally to initialize the contract instead of through a constructor

setBridge(address).notice: Update the Holograph Bridge module address

setFactory(address).notice: Update the Holograph Factory module address

setInterfaces(address).notice: Update the Holograph Interfaces module address

setOperator(address).notice: Update the Holograph Operator module address

setRegistry(address).notice: Update the Holograph Registry module address

setTreasury(address).notice: Update the Holograph Treasury module address

setUtilityToken(address).notice: Update the Holograph Utility Token address

userdoc.notice: This is the primary Holograph Protocol smart contract
